oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CORE Organic II - Tapping into Europe's organic Trend
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Anonymous,
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Organic food production has continued to grow in popularity, partly because it taps into a number ofcontemporary consumer concerns such as animal welfare and healthy eating. A new project aims tocapitalise on this demand by ensuring better research coordination across Europe.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Anonymous, (2012) CORE Organic II - Tapping into Europe's organic Trend. .
